item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m Alen Abraham (he/him), a Software Engineer from Kerala, India ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³. I focus on DevOps, Cloud and Cloud native environments along with a strong interest towards Open-Source. I like to learn new stuffs, especially topics related to site reliability, devops, security and almost all kinds of tech stuffs. I write tech and career related blogposts here on my website and on various other platforms like Dev.to and Hashnode etc. I completed my Bachelorâ€™s degree in Electronics and Communication Engineering(ECE) from College of Engineering Chengannur(CEC) on July 2021.

item.title: Subscribe
item.description: When you subscribe to my blog, you will receive weekly newsletters and my latest articles delivered directly to your inbox. You will also have access to exclusive, “subscriber only” content. You can learn more About Me before you subscribe.
